headline: Marsh McLennan’s Oliver Wyman to acquire Validate Health, terms not disclosed
summary: Oliver Wyman announced an agreement to acquire Validate Health, a healthcare analytics business that enables healthcare providers and Accountable Care Organizations to better manage costs, risk, and performance. The terms of the transaction, expected to close in summer 2025, were not disclosed. Validate Health will join Oliver Wyman Actuarial, a specialized business within Oliver Wyman that provides actuarial services to insurers, investors, healthcare providers, corporates and other clients. headline: Marsh & McLennan to Acquire Validate Health to Expand Healthcare Reach
summary: MMC's Oliver Wyman to acquire Validate Health, boosting analytics capabilities for value-based healthcare growth.
